ComicInfo.Summary:
As a result of an explosion during the Korean War, Harry Miles is given 5 years to live. He becames a successful mystery writer, but then his characters start to come alive.
Explorers in the Arctic hear the legend of the "veelik," a half-man/half polar bear, then see evidence of one as they depart.
